name: container-hub
description: Docker Registry UI is a user-friendly interface for browsing and managing Docker images from a registry. It supports search, tags, delete operations, and provides a clean and simple dashboard.
features: Registry Browsing: View all Docker images in your registry at a glance. Clear visual overview.
Tag Management: Browse and compare different image versions easily. Track your releases.
Delete Operations: Remove unused images to free up storage space. Keep registry clean.
Search Functionality: Find images quickly with powerful search. Locate what you need fast.
Clean Dashboard: Simple, intuitive interface for registry management. No complexity, just results.
Self-Hosted: Manage your private Docker registry with ease. Complete control over images.
